verses.verse: Give ear <S%H238><s%>, O Shepherd <S%H7462><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, you that lead <S%H5090><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> like a flock <S%H6629><s%>; you that live <S%H3427><s%> between the cherubims <S%H3742><s%>, shine forth <S%H3313><s%>.
Before <S%H6440><s%> Ephraim <S%H669><s%> and Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> and Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> stir up <S%H5782><s%> your strength <S%H1369><s%>, and come <S%H3212><s%> and save us <S%H3444><s%>.
Turn us again <S%H7725><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>, and cause your face <S%H6440><s%> to shine <S%H215><s%>; and we shall be saved <S%H3467><s%>.
O Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, how long will you be angry <S%H6225><s%> against the prayer <S%H8605><s%> of your people <S%H5971><s%>?
You feed <S%H398><s%> them with the bread <S%H3899><s%> of tears <S%H1832><s%>; and give them tears <S%H1832><s%> to drink <S%H8248><s%> in great measure <S%H7991><s%>.
You make <S%H7760><s%> us a strife <S%H4066><s%> unto our neighbors <S%H7934><s%>: and our enemies <S%H341><s%> laugh among themselves <S%H3932><s%>.
Turn us again <S%H7725><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, and cause your face <S%H6440><s%> to shine <S%H215><s%>; and we shall be saved <S%H3467><s%>.
You have brought <S%H5265><s%> a vine <S%H1612><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: you have cast out <S%H1644><s%> the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, and planted it <S%H5193><s%>.
You prepared <S%H6437><s%> room before <S%H6440><s%> it <S%H8328><s%>, and did cause it to take deep root <S%H8327><s%>, and it filled <S%H4390><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>.
The hills <S%H2022><s%> were covered <S%H3680><s%> with the shadow <S%H6738><s%> of it <S%H6057><s%>, and the boughs there were like the good <S%H410><s%> cedars <S%H730><s%>.
She sent out <S%H7971><s%> her boughs <S%H7105><s%> unto the sea <S%H3220><s%>, and her branches <S%H3127><s%> unto the river <S%H5104><s%>.
Why have you then broken down <S%H6555><s%> her hedges <S%H1447><s%>, so that all they which pass <S%H5674><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> do pluck her <S%H717><s%>?
The boar <S%H2386><s%> out of the wood <S%H3293><s%> does waste <S%H3765><s%> it <S%H2123><s%>, and the wild animal of the field <S%H7704><s%> does devour it <S%H7462><s%>.

Return <S%H7725><s%>, we beg you <S%H430><s%>, O God of hosts <S%H6635><s%>: look down <S%H5027><s%> from heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and behold <S%H7200><s%>, and visit <S%H6485><s%> this vine <S%H1612><s%>;
And the vineyard <S%H3657><s%> which your right hand <S%H3225><s%> has planted <S%H5193><s%>, and the branch <S%H1121><s%> that you made strong for yourself <S%H553><s%>.
It is burned <S%H8313><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>, it is cut down <S%H3683><s%>: they perish <S%H6><s%> at the rebuke <S%H1606><s%> of your favor <S%H6440><s%>.
Let your hand <S%H3027><s%> be upon the man <S%H376><s%> of your right hand <S%H3225><s%>, upon the son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> whom you made strong for yourself <S%H553><s%>.
So will not we go back <S%H5472><s%> from you <S%H2421><s%>: quicken us <S%H7121><s%>, and we will call upon your name <S%H8034><s%>.
Turn us again <S%H7725><s%>, O Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, cause your face <S%H6440><s%> to shine <S%H215><s%>; and we shall be saved <S%H3467><s%>.
